alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Evacuation Immediate issued March 17 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Abilene Emergency Management. Immediate Evacuation - Wildfire - Updated Street Locations A fire is threatening lives and property a portion of the city of Abilene. The evacuation area is from South of West Highway 80 to North of Military Drive, and west of Arnold Boulevard. Evacuate now if you are in the area mentioned and monitor local media for more information.... People in and around the evacuation area should follow the advice of local authorities. Do not attempt to fight the fire yourselves. For more information tune to local radio and TV.
